name: convexus
description: ⚒️ An SDK for building applications on top of Convexus

scripts.reset: npm run clean && npx lerna clean -y
scripts.build: npm run cleanup && npx lerna run compile
scripts.build:watch: npm run cleanup && npx lerna run compile:watch --stream --no-sort
scripts.clean: npx rimraf -rf node_modules package-lock.json yarn.lock && npx lerna run clean --stream --parallel
scripts.demo: npm run build && (cd packages/sdk-demo && npm run start)
